value: LEVEL 14 123 PITT STREET, SYDNEY, 2000, NSW, Australia

6371 - Pension, Health and Welfare Funds Summary > PERPETUAL SUPERANNUATION LIMITED (formerly PERPETUAL PROPERTY SECURITIES LIMITED) is an Australian public company. Its operations cover pension, health and welfare funds. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. PERPETUAL SUPERANNUATION LIMITED is headquartered in Sydney, New South Wales. It is headed by CEO & managing director Mark John Smith. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $36.43 million. Its net profit totalled $8.41 million. PERPETUAL SUPERANNUATION LIMITED forms part of the finance, insurance, and real estate industry sector.
